attributes.action: Stop Schools from not allowing children to go to the toilet during lessons.
attributes.background: Teachers stop children from using the toilet during lessons, not only does this cause discomfort it can also have effects on your medical health, leading to weakening bladder muscles and could cause incontinence (wetting yourself). This is not ok, people in the workplace can, so why can't students?

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

This would be a matter for individual schools to decide. You could raise the issue with your Headteacher or senior school leadership team.
